nodes.text: Repulsorsail skiff was a kind of vehicle using obsolete repulsorsail technology and mounted pontoons. One of the models was the Jal-paara G-62 Repulsorsail Skiff.

Although obsolete in 29 BBY, it was quite extended in Lamaredd. Mix Liddell and MD-0C6 owned repulsorsail skiffs, and Ackrahbala's Swoops & Speeders, a business in Lamaredd, rented these vehicles by 100 credits per day (including a 10% of the full value as a deposit).
